name: Hitman: Contracts HD
description:
Delve into the mind of Agent 47 and complete the work that made him so brutally efficient and shaped him as an assassin. YOU must eliminate your targets by any means necessary. There are no rules... only the contract, signed in blood.
The game features 12 levels set in various locations where you must come face to face with some of the world's most dangerous criminals and high profile targets.

1 player
HDTV screen resolution: 720p
DUALSHOCK®3
